name: Time Dilation (Nemario)
description:
The Humanity lost the war against cruel time. You're using your ship that can fly faster than light, but then you start to realize that few moments for you - thousand years for Universe. If you wait more - all stars and planets will crumble to dust.

 Can you reach the black hole?

How to play.
On the left you can see the button that opens star map. Click on preferred star, close the map and press "GO!" button.

There is also "Scan" button that allows you to scan planets and see if they have valuble resources.

The end is a big white point on the other side of the map.
